Uses of Package
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene

Packages that use edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.atlas Provides services that manage the mouse reference atlas. 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.changes Provides functionality for revision control within the environment. 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene Provides models of objects that can be rendered in the visual scene. 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.semantic Provides access to ontology databases and data structures. 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util Classes that provide basic functionality useful to classes in many different packages. 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view Provides the basic root classes for the "view" part of the model-view-controller architecture. 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.procedural Provides procedural rendering of objects in the visual space (not yet implemented). 
edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene Draws the "view" version of explicitly defined objects in the scene. 
 

Classes in edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.scene used by edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.core.atlas
ISceneObject
          Defines an object that can be viewed in the scene.
ISelectable
          A general interface for any object that can be selected by a user.

          An implementation of ICurve
ICurve
          Defines a Bezier curve in the framework.
IMesh
          Defines a polygonal mesh object that represents a 3D object segmented from microscopy data.
INeuronMorphology
          Describes the morphology of the cell, independent of different ways of visualizing it.
IScene
          Defines the totality of the objects that can be viewed in the 3D world
ISceneObject
          Defines an object that can be viewed in the scene.
ISegment
          Defines the smallest unit of an INeuronMorphology.
ISegmentGroup
          Defines a group of segments in a neuron morphology.
ISelectable
          A general interface for any object that can be selected by a user.
ISlide
          A Panel in 3D space that displays an image of a brain slice.
ISurface
          Defines a Bezier Surface.
IVolume
          Defines a volume of space, identified by the boundaries of a box or a sphere.
SceneObjectImpl
           
SceneObjectManager
          Keeps lists of all scene objects.
